backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining file, note, folder, mission, and authorization types with storage mixins and basic health/diagnostics queries plus ID and state management.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a specific intro screen timing change to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plain-text JSON-style mapping of frontend file paths to short functional summaries for build planning.
frontend/DRAFT_BASELINE_V114.md: Documentation describing creation of a draft baseline identical to Live v114 with verification steps and change control rules.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML document configuring PWA metadata, icons, and service worker registration.
frontend/PAUSE_AFTER_RESTORE.md: Change-freeze notice explaining that no code changes are permitted post-restore until explicit user approval.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest describing app metadata, icons, and launch configuration.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precaching, runtime caching, and offline fallback logic.
frontend/PWA_INSTALLABILITY_NOTES.md: Guide outlining Chrome PWA installability requirements and steps for verifying manifest, service worker, and icons.
frontend/RESTORE_LIVE_V114_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist confirming all frontend files and behaviors match Live v114 after restoration with detailed verification across flows and components.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wrapper managing theming, providers, authentication intro flow, and page rendering.
frontend/src/components/ActorInitErrorSt: UI component that displays detailed initialization errors with retry and logout actions.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedGalleryI: Renders an animated SVG target-style gallery icon with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/ConnectivityIndi: Empty component placeholder with no implemented UI.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeBottom: Displays a fixed, subtle bottom horizontal line for visual separation.
frontend/src/components/ExternalOpenFall: Dialog prompting users to retry opening a blocked file or download it instead.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewDialo: Dialog showing previews for various file types with actions like download, open, move, and delete.
frontend/src/components/FileUploadSectio: Handles file, link, and note uploads with progress tracking and speech-to-text support.
frontend/src/components/FoldersButton.ts: Floating button that opens the folders UI using a folder icon.
frontend/src/components/FoldersDialog.ts: Deprecated folder-management dialog supporting creation, renaming, deletion, and selection.
frontend/src/components/FoldersFullScree: Full-screen folder manager allowing creation, renaming, deletion, and selection of folders.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing attribution with a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenViewer: Displays files in a full‑screen carousel with swipe navigation and actions like delete, download, share, and move.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Renders a gallery of files and notes with selection, long‑press actions, and opening items in viewers.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Shows the app header with theme toggle, auth menu, and progress bar.
frontend/src/components/IntroScreen.tsx: Displays a temporary animated splash screen before the app loads.
frontend/src/components/LinkOpenFallback: Dialog shown when a link cannot open, offering retry or copy options.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button to authenticate using Internet Identity with loading state.
frontend/src/components/MissionDetailFul: Full‑screen mission detail page with tasks, attached files/notes, autosave, and viewer support.
frontend/src/components/MissionEditorDia: Dialog for creating missions with title and task management before saving.
frontend/src/components/MissionsButton.t: Renders a floating missions button with hover animations and optional disabled/overlay states.
frontend/src/components/MissionsFullScre: Displays a full-screen missions list with swipe navigation, creation/edit/delete actions, and split completed/incomplete views.
frontend/src/components/MobileOnlyLayout: A layout wrapper that constrains content to a mobile‑only container.
frontend/src/components/MoveToMissionDia: Dialog for selecting a mission and moving selected files or notes into it, with loading and success/error handling.
frontend/src/components/NotesButton.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/NotesDialog.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/NotesFullScreenV: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/NoteViewerDialog: Dialog for viewing a note with options to send, download, share, or delete it.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/SendToFolderDial: Dialog for moving files or notes to folders or back to the main collection, with performance diagnostics and processing states.
Swipeable row component enabling edit/delete actions with pointer‑based drag gestures.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedProgressB: Shows a global upload progress bar when uploads are active.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeIntroScre: React component rendering the introductory welcome screen with a target-themed SVG and animated text.
frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx: Context managing backend actor creation, retry logic, admin token initialization, and authentication-based lifecycle.
frontend/src/contexts/UploadContext.tsx: Context tracking upload items with progress coalescing, legacy upload APIs, and utilities to add, update, and clear uploads.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches a backend actor via react-query, handling identity changes and admin token setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppReturnIntro.ts: Hook detecting when the app returns to the foreground and triggers a callback for authenticated users.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomePrefetch.ts: Hook prefetching core home data when the backend actor becomes ready, avoiding repeat fetches per session.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provider and hook for managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, stored identities, and related state.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCoarsePointer.ts: Hook detecting whether the device uses a coarse pointer, indicating touch-based input.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionAutosave.ts: Implements debounced autosave for mission title and tasks with change detection, mission switch handling, and queued saves.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionsQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks to list, fetch, create, and update missions via the backend actor with targeted cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotesQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching, creating, and deleting notes with folder/mission targeting and concurrency‑limited creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Offers React Query hooks for files and folders, including mission/folder‑scoped queries and concurrency‑limited file uploads.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechToText.ts: Wraps browser speech recognition into a hook providing transcript callbacks, error handling, and listening state management.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive light/dark theme CSS variables for colors and layout styling.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a helper function to merge class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the main home page logic, managing identity state, data fetching, lazy-loaded views, and optional smoke testing.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitializationMe: Provides standardized actor initialization error messages and utilities to classify and serialize related errors.
frontend/src/utils/externalOpen.ts: Implements utilities for opening URLs, downloading files, sharing files or notes, with popup-blocking detection.
frontend/src/utils/fileOpenRules.ts: Defines logic for determining how files should open based on MIME type, including viewer, preview, or download actions.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Categorizes files by MIME type and provides helpers for previewability and user-friendly type labels.
frontend/src/utils/missionCompletion.ts: Calculates mission progress, determines completion, and splits missions into completed and incomplete lists.
frontend/src/utils/missionTaskCompare.ts: Compares arrays of mission tasks with BigInt-safe equality checks.
frontend/src/utils/notesTime.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/utils/performanceDiagnostic: Provides a lightweight performance logging utility with timed operations and async wrappers enabled via URL or localStorage flags.
frontend/src/utils/reactQueryDiagnostics: Logs React Query mutation lifecycle events in development mode for debugging.
frontend/src/utils/smokeTestCoreFlows.ts: Runs development-only smoke tests for folder, mission, link, and note creation using backend actors and formats results.
frontend/src/utils/uploadConcurrency.ts: Implements a simple concurrency limiter to control parallel async operations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support and hash parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radii, animations, and plugin setup.
frontend/V114_BASELINE_FRONTEND_FILES.tx: Lists all frontend files included in the v114 baseline for verification and drift detection.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the requirement to set the splash screen duration to 2 seconds with no other changes.
